mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE CATEGORY = 'E' AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) JOIN ERROR_BOARD E ON (BOARD_NO = E.REF_BNO) JOIN CREATE_SETTING C ON (E.REF_SNO = C.SETTING_NO)
AND M.NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND UPPER(C.SETTING_TITLE) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%')
WHERE B.CATEGORY = 'E' AND B.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO, SETTING_TITLE, TITLE, NICKNAME, SOLVED, NOTICE, B.CREATE_DATE, B.COUNT, COUNT(R.REPLY_NO) REPLY_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN ERROR_BOARD E ON(B.BOARD_NO = E.REF_BNO) JOIN CREATE_SETTING C ON(E.REF_SNO = C.SETTING_NO) LEFT JOIN REPLY R ON(B.BOARD_NO = R.REF_BNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.CATEGORY = 'E' AND SOLVED||ERROR_TYPE != 'NS' GROUP BY BOARD_NO, SETTING_TITLE, TITLE, NICKNAME, SOLVED, NOTICE, B.CREATE_DATE, B.COUNT ORDER BY DECODE(NOTICE,'Y',1,'N',2), DECODE(SOLVED,'N',1,'Y',2), CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO, SETTING_TITLE, TITLE, NICKNAME, SOLVED, NOTICE, B.CREATE_DATE, B.COUNT, COUNT(R.REPLY_NO) REPLY_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN ERROR_BOARD E ON (B.BOARD_NO = E.REF_BNO) JOIN CREATE_SETTING C ON(E.REF_SNO = C.SETTING_NO) LEFT JOIN REPLY R ON(B.BOARD_NO = R.REF_BNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.CATEGORY = 'E' AND SOLVED||ERROR_TYPE != 'NS'
AND M.NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND UPPER(C.SETTING_TITLE) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%')
GROUP BY BOARD_NO, SETTING_TITLE, TITLE, NICKNAME, SOLVED, NOTICE, B.CREATE_DATE, B.COUNT
ORDER BY B.CREATE_DATE ASC
ORDER BY B.CREATE_DATE DESC
ORDER BY B.COUNT DESC
ORDER BY B.COUNT ASC
ORDER BY DECODE(NOTICE,'Y',1,'N',2), DECODE(SOLVED,'N',1,'Y',2), CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, SETTING_TITLE, SETTING_VERSION, SETTING_CODE, NICKNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, SOLVED, ERROR_TYPE, MODIFIED_CODE, MODIFIED_INFO, SETTING_INFO FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN ERROR_BOARD E ON (B.BOARD_NO = E.REF_BNO) JOIN CREATE_SETTING C ON(E.REF_SNO = C.SETTING_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT SETTING_TITLE FROM CREATE_SETTING WHERE STATUS IN ('Y','N') GROUP BY SETTING_TITLE ORDER BY SETTING_TITLE
SELECT SETTING_VERSION FROM CREATE_SETTING WHERE SETTING_TITLE = #{settingTitle} AND STATUS IN ('Y','N') ORDER BY 1 DESC
SELECT MAX(SETTING_VERSION) FROM CREATE_SETTING WHERE SETTING_TITLE = #{settingTitle} AND STATUS IN ('Y','N')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, CATEGORY, BOARD_WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, 'E', #{boardWriter}, #{title}, #{content})
INSERT INTO ERROR_BOARD (REF_BNO, REF_SNO, MODIFIED_CODE, MODIFIED_INFO) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, #{refSno}, #{modifiedCode}, #{modifiedInfo})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, NICKNAME, NVL2(GITHUB_ID, 'Y', 'N') SUPPORTERS, TO_CHAR(R.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD AMHH:MI') AS CREATE_DATE, NVL(FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME, '/koala/resources/memberImage/default.jpg') AS MEMBER_IMAGE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.REPLY_WRITER = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER_IMAGE I ON(M.USER_NO = I.REF_UNO) LEFT JOIN SUPPORTERS S ON(M.USER_NO = S.REF_UNO) WHERE R.REF_BNO = #{boardNo} AND R.STATUS IN ('Y', 'W') ORDER BY 4 DESC, 1 DESC
